oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Formation photograph of 7th Regiment Maneuver participants
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Members of the 7th Regiment of the Tennessee State Guard pose in formation during maneuvers.

Members of the 7th Regiment of the Tennessee State Guard participated in the first large-scale maneuvers of the organization held in Cookeville. Most of the maneuvers took place on the farm of Captain Joe Scott. The maneuvers included simulated paratroop landings. Several planes of the Civilian Air Patrol also participated in the maneuvers. The maneuvers were declared a success and proved that the State Guard could handle a major defense problem.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tennessee State Guard, 1941-1946
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tennessee. Militia; Tennessee - History, Military; World War, 1939-1945
